subject: Sales
title: Trust: The Currency of Brand
description: A 60-second lesson on Trust: The Currency of Brand.

hook.text: A tiny startup beats an industry giant for a deal. The reason: the buyer trusted their rep more.

buildup.text: Brand trust accumulates through consistent delivery. Every kept promise adds to the total balance.

discovery.text: Edelman research shows people trust individuals more than institutions. Personal brand wins deals.

twist.text: Trust takes years to build and moments to destroy. One broken promise can erase a decade of credibility.

climax.text: Under-promise and over-deliver with discipline. Trust compounds like interest â€” slowly, then suddenly.

punchline.text: Trust is the currency that never inflates.

quiz.question: According to Edelman research, who do people trust more?
